data.title: About - Moon Man Studios
data.meta_description: Moon Man Studios: Moon Man is a concept studio that specializes in innovative art direction and creative production.
data.text:
Moon Man is a concept studio that specializes in innovative art direction and creative production.

Based in the heart of creativity : Moon Man Studios collaborates with a diverse range of clients to provide multidisciplinary solutions within creative content development focused around the arts.

We direct – curate – brand – style – advise – publish.

Our team consults with media companies to create new projects that span contemporary art, design and global culture. All in the name of great art!

Awards: Berlin Fashion Film festival : best cinematography : best tunes : best mua crew : best special effects | nomination : best director. Aesthetica Film Festival best fashion flick. London Independent Film Festival : best short short. Official Selection : Aesthetica Short Film Festival, Berlin Fashion Film Festival, The International Fashion Film Awards, La Jolla Fashion Film Festival, London Independent Film Festival, Fashion Film Festival Milano, Miami Fashion Film Festival, Raindance Film Festival
